abstracts.cdata!:
Project preparation was drawn out and
            complicated by high rates of turnover among senior officials
            of the Ministry of Public Health, as well as by their lack
            of familiarity with the content and practical implications
            of health sector reform and with the Bank. In July 1993, the
            Bank recommended that Government request loan cancellation.
            Ninety-nine percent of the loan was cancelled in January 1994.
